<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor&lt;T, Bits, bool&gt;</a></>}>
<code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a></code> is used to manipulate the bits of a (possibly signed) integer type so it can be packed and unpacked into a <code>bits</code> sized integer, <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor">Compressor</a></code> is specialized on signed-ness so no runtime cost is incurred. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfields-details/compressor/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>
